app.name: Dump Mii NAND
app.long_description:
This will create a nand.bin file in SD:/nand.bin. and save the keys to SD:/keys.bin.
Arguments: debug= show debug output (defaut's to 0) path= for a custom path to the nand.bin file on SD. E.G. path=/apps/nanddump/nand.bin (No folder name in the path can have more than 8 characters)
